title: Kled ult goes through Yorick wall
body: Just played a game where kled ult literally ran through my Yorick W. Anivia's wall blocks him, so yoricks should as well

replies.body: Make sure that it didn't have a lock on you or your allies when it went through your W. Once his ult locks onto a target he'll go through anything, walls or terrain, until he hits that target he locked onto.

So how kled ult works is there is two parts one which is him charging to a location he picked out and two his lock onto an enemy champion. What is sounds like is that kled locked onto whatever champion and although Yorick used his wall as long as kled locked onto that champion he will follow them until he collides with them. So Kled this means that kled can go through any terrain as long as that lock on is present.
Did he actually run through it? Or did he use it.... And then got to the point where it targets the champion and locks on?
